data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guglielmino, Adalgisa, Olmi, Massimo (2013): Revision of the extant Nearctic species of Dryinus Latreille 1804 group 1 (Hymenoptera: Dryinidae), with description of a new species from the USA. Zootaxa 3691 (5): 577-590, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3691.5.4
